properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 13 at 3:01AM PST until February 14 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts to 25 kt. Seas building
to 10 to 15 feet at 18 seconds late tonight.

* WHERE...Waters from Cape Shoalwater WA to Cascade Head OR from
10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 4 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 PM PST FRIDAY
